info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 10:10PM CDT until April 03 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL COMANCHE AND SOUTHWESTERN CADDO COUNTIES... At 1010 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Apache to near Boone to near Lake Lawtonka, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter size hail east of Meers. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lake Lawtonka, Meers, Boone and eastern Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
